name: Ravendown
description:
This is a small arena shooter game that we made for our first game project at our school PlaygroundSquad in Sweden. Please test our game and write some feedback in the comments, hope you enjoy!

----------------- How to play ----------------- 

You start in the middle of the arena where you can interact/pull the chain that will start the waves of enemies to start spawning. (You can skip the chain going up by pressing "P")

You have a essence (mana) system where you gain essence when you kill enemies and you start the game with 0 essence. Essence slowly decay when you haven't killed anything after a short while (around 3 seconds).

Try to survive as long as possible and get as many enemy kills as you can :)

----------------- CONTROLS ----------------- 

Keyboard

WASD - Movement

E - Heal ability. (Costs essence/mana)

SHIFT - Dash in your currently moving direction. (Does not cost essence/mana)

SPACE - Uses a blast/explosion ability around your character. (Costs essence/mana)

Mouse

Aim by moving the mouse.

LEFT CLICK - auto attack/ shoot. (Hold to shoot quickly)

RIGHT CLICK - Fires a piercing shot. (Costs essence/mana)
